title: 新约 - 启示录(Revelation) - 第 8 章
subTitle: 新约 -- 启示录(Revelation) -- 第 8 章 ( 本篇共有 22 章 )

lineList.en: And when he had opened the seventh seal, there was silence in heaven about the space of half an hour.
lineList.cn: 羔羊揭开第七印的时候，天上寂静约有二刻。

lineList.en: And I saw the seven angels which stood before God; and to them were given seven trumpets.
lineList.cn: 我看见那站在神面前的七位天使，有七枝号赐给他们。

lineList.en: And another angel came and stood at the altar, having a golden censer; and there was given unto him much incense, that he should offer it with the prayers of all saints upon the golden altar which was before the throne.
lineList.cn: 另有一位天使拿着金香炉，来站在祭坛旁边。有许多香赐给他，要和众圣徒的祈祷一同献在宝座前的金坛上。

lineList.en: And the smoke of the incense, which came with the prayers of the saints, ascended up before God out of the angel's hand.
lineList.cn: 那香的烟，和众圣徒的祈祷，从天使的手中一同升到神面前。

lineList.en: And the angel took the censer, and filled it with fire of the altar, and cast it into the earth: and there were voices, and thunderings, and lightnings, and an earthquake.
lineList.cn: 天使拿着香炉，盛满了坛上的火，倒在地上。随有雷轰，大声，闪电，地震。

lineList.en: And the seven angels which had the seven trumpets prepared themselves to sound.
lineList.cn: 拿着七枝号的七位天使，就豫备要吹。

lineList.en: The first angel sounded, and there followed hail and fire mingled with blood, and they were cast upon the earth: and the third part of trees was burnt up, and all green grass was burnt up.
lineList.cn: 第一位天使吹号，就有雹子与火搀着血丢在地上。地的三分之一和树的三分之一被烧了，一切的青草也被烧了。

lineList.en: And the second angel sounded, and as it were a great mountain burning with fire was cast into the sea: and the third part of the sea became blood;
lineList.cn: 第二位天使吹号，就有彷佛火烧着的大山扔在海中。海的三分之一变成血。

lineList.en: And the third part of the creatures which were in the sea, and had life, died; and the third part of the ships were destroyed.
lineList.cn: 海中的活物死了三分之一。船只也坏了三分之一。

lineList.en: And the third angel sounded, and there fell a great star from heaven, burning as it were a lamp, and it fell upon the third part of the rivers, and upon the fountains of waters;
lineList.cn: 第三位天使吹号，就有烧着的大星，好像火把从天上落下来，落在江河的三分之一，和众水的泉源上。

lineList.en: And the name of the star is called Wormwood: and the third part of the waters became wormwood; and many men died of the waters, because they were made bitter.
lineList.cn: 这星名叫茵？？。众水的三分之一便为茵？？。因水变苦，就死了许多人。

lineList.en: And the fourth angel sounded, and the third part of the sun was smitten, and the third part of the moon, and the third part of the stars; so as the third part of them was darkened, and the day shone not for a third part of it, and the night likewise.
lineList.cn: 第四位天使吹号，日头的三分之一，月亮的三分之一，星辰的三分之一，都被击打。以致日月星的三分之一黑暗了，白昼的三分之一没有光，黑夜也是这样。

lineList.en: And I beheld, and heard an angel flying through the midst of heaven, saying with a loud voice, Woe, woe, woe, to the inhabiters of the earth by reason of the other voices of the trumpet of the three angels, which are yet to sound!
lineList.cn: 我又看见一个鹰飞在空中，并听见他大声说，三位天使要吹那其馀的号，你们住在地上的民，祸哉，祸哉，祸哉。
